name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY2】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [WubP90C6KlY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Opening movie with a countdown, showing Tokino Sora's journey and preparing the audience for the 8th-anniversary party.
The audience cheers as the title card for '8th Starry Bl∞min' Anniversary Party' appears on screen.
Tokino Sora appears on stage and performs 'Beyond' (ビヨンド).
Tokino Sora transitions into a performance of 'Starry Bl∞min''.

subtitles.original: 2024 6th year
subtitles.english: 2024 6th year

subtitles.original: ARE YOU READY?
subtitles.english: ARE YOU READY?

subtitles.original: 8th Starry Bl∞min' Anniversary Party
subtitles.english: 8th Starry Bl∞min' Anniversary Party

subtitles.original: 最高だ 暴れちゃって 世界線 上書きしちゃって
subtitles.english: It's awesome! Let's go wild and overwrite the worldline!

subtitles.original: きっと 絶好調の先へ 行こうにゃん
subtitles.english: I'm sure we can go beyond our peak. Let's go, nyan!

subtitles.original: 十六分音符の風 聞こえてきて何だかそりゃ
subtitles.english: The wind of sixteenth notes... hearing it, I'm like, what is that?

subtitles.original: 無意識出す返事 それくらい揺らぐ
subtitles.english: An unconscious response... that's how much I'm swaying.

subtitles.original: もう一回 まだ覚めないで この指にとまれ
subtitles.english: One more time, don't wake up yet. Gather 'round me!

subtitles.original: 追加投資頂戴 まだまだ足りない
subtitles.english: Give me more of your support! It's still not enough!

subtitles.original: SOS脳内
subtitles.english: SOS in my brain.

subtitles.original: もう一回 もう待てない 今すぐ会ってたい
subtitles.english: One more time! I can't wait anymore, I want to see you right now!

subtitles.original: 全速力で
subtitles.english: At full speed!

subtitles.original: 最高だ 暴れちゃって 世界線 上書きしちゃって
subtitles.english: It's awesome! Let's go wild and overwrite the worldline!

subtitles.original: 君の音が聞きたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to hear your sound!

subtitles.original: 熱気が満ち溢れちゃって フレーム飛び出しちゃって
subtitles.english: The heat is overflowing, jumping out of the frame!

subtitles.original: 一秒足らずの心 奪おう
subtitles.english: Let's steal your heart in less than a second!

subtitles.original: 共鳴 絶好調
subtitles.english: Resonance at its peak!

subtitles.original: この声辿ってよ
subtitles.english: Follow this voice!

subtitles.original: 夢思考 デラックスを奪おう
subtitles.english: Dream thoughts, let's take the deluxe!

subtitles.original: 目覚めたらこの感情 アナログ変換して
subtitles.english: When I wake up, convert this emotion into analog,

subtitles.original: 喜怒哀楽最高 一秒止められない
subtitles.english: All sorts of emotions at their best. I can't stop for a second!

subtitles.original: この状態どうだい 邪な進化以来
subtitles.english: How's this state? Ever since the wicked evolution,

subtitles.original: 欲まみれ 限界行きたいな
subtitles.english: Full of greed, I want to reach the limit,

subtitles.original: 予定で脱走 仕留められない
subtitles.english: Escaping as planned, you can't catch me!

subtitles.original: この状態どうだい 教えて会ってたい
subtitles.english: How's this state? Tell me, I want to see you,

subtitles.original: 全速力で
subtitles.english: At full speed!

subtitles.original: 最高が膨らんじゃって 世界線リンクしちゃって
subtitles.english: The best is swelling, linking the worldlines!

subtitles.original: 君の熱を感じるんだ
subtitles.english: I can feel your heat!

subtitles.original: 焦燥が満ち溢れちゃって 際限を壊しちゃって
subtitles.english: Impatience is overflowing, destroying the boundaries!

subtitles.original: 一度きりの手を伸ばしたよ
subtitles.english: I reached out my hand for this once-in-a-lifetime chance!

subtitles.original: 最高が膨らんじゃって 共鳴上書きしちゃって
subtitles.english: The best is swelling, overwriting the resonance!

subtitles.original: 君に愛を届けるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll deliver my love to you!

subtitles.original: 鮮度が満ち溢れちゃって 全てが溢れちゃって
subtitles.english: Freshness is overflowing, everything is overflowing!

subtitles.original: 一度きりの有り余りにしてよ
subtitles.english: Make it more than enough for this one time!

subtitles.original: 共鳴 絶好調
subtitles.english: Resonance at its peak!

subtitles.original: この声辿ってよ
subtitles.english: Follow this voice!

subtitles.original: 夢思考 デラックスを奪おう
subtitles.english: Dream thoughts, let's take the deluxe!

subtitles.original: 待ってるよ 待ってるよ 待ってるよ 待ってるよ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting, I'm waiting, I'm waiting, I'm waiting!

subtitles.original: 描きかけたキャンバスに 鮮やかな彩りを
subtitles.english: Adding vivid colors to the canvas I've started painting.

subtitles.original: 一歩ずつ踏み出して ここから始まったストーリー
subtitles.english: Stepping out one by one, the story that started from here.

subtitles.original: 夢で見た景色は
subtitles.english: The scenery I saw in my dreams...

subtitles.original: 憧れを叶えて
subtitles.english: ...granted my longings.

subtitles.original: 待ってるよ 待ってるよ 待ってるよ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting, I'm waiting, I'm waiting!

subtitles.original: この広い空で
subtitles.english: Under this vast sky.

subtitles.original: あの日から君と 越えた境界線も
subtitles.english: Even the boundaries I crossed with you since that day,

subtitles.original: 待ってるよ 待ってるよ 待ってるよ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting, I'm waiting, I'm waiting!

subtitles.original: 夢の方目掛けて
subtitles.english: Aiming towards the dream!

subtitles.original: きっと声 届いて
subtitles.english: I'm sure my voice will reach you!

subtitles.original: 世界は広がって まだ続くこの先を
subtitles.english: The world expands, and I'll continue on to what lies ahead.

subtitles.original: 夢みたいな色で まだまだ追いかけ続けて
subtitles.english: In dream-like colors, I'll keep chasing after it forever.

subtitles.original: チャレンジは止まらない
subtitles.english: The challenge never stops!

subtitles.original: 手と手を繋いで
subtitles.english: Hand in hand,

subtitles.original: 待ってるよ 待ってるよ 待ってるよ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting, I'm waiting, I'm waiting!

subtitles.original: 今もずっとここで
subtitles.english: Still right here, always.

subtitles.original: いつの日か君が 見つけてくれる日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day you find me.

subtitles.original: 待ってるよ 待ってるよ 待ってるよ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting, I'm waiting, I'm waiting!

subtitles.original: 時空さえも超えて 君の元へ
subtitles.english: Even transcending space and time, to where you are!
